tweet: Measure your speaking rate and plan your presentations accordingly. 120 words per min is ok 110 is painfully slow. #speakertip
Mark up your written speech with pauses and practice using the pauses. #speakertip
Minimise use of statistics. Too many statistics confuse people. Two out of three people is good - better than 66.6667 percent. #speakertip
Don't fidget with things in your pockets. That's why you empty them out before speaking or better still sew them up.
